import './App.css'; import { Label, Note } from "./types"; // Import the Label type from the appropriate module import { dummyNotesList } from "./constant"; // Import the dummyNotesList from the appropriate module import './hooksExercise.tsx'; function App() { return (
{dummyNotesList.map((note) => (

{note.title}

{note.content}

{note.label}

))}
); } export default App;
